mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.goods_id as goodsId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.shouhou_commentback_text as shouhouCommentbackText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,goods.goods_name as goodsName ,goods.goods_types as goodsTypes ,goods.goods_photo as goodsPhoto ,goods.goods_pinpai as goodsPinpai ,goods.goods_new_money as goodsNewMoney ,goods.goods_caizhi as goodsCaizhi ,goods.goods_fujia as goodsFujia ,goods.goods_candi as goodsCandi ,goods.goods_content as goodsContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.new_money as newMoney ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM goods_liuyan a left JOIN goods goods ON a.goods_id = goods.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.goods_id = #{params.goodsId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.shouhou_commentback_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shouhouCommentbackText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.goods_id IS NOT NULL
and goods.goods_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.goodsName},'%')
and goods.goods_types = #{params.goodsTypes}
and goods.goods_pinpai like CONCAT('%',#{params.goodsPinpai},'%')
and goods.goods_new_money >= #{params.goodsNewMoneyStart}
and goods.goods_new_money <= #{params.goodsNewMoneyEnd}
and goods.goods_caizhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.goodsCaizhi},'%')
and goods.goods_fujia like CONCAT('%',#{params.goodsFujia},'%')
and goods.goods_candi like CONCAT('%',#{params.goodsCandi},'%')
and goods.goods_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.goodsContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and yonghu.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
